title: icopress
author: icopress
created_time: July 25, 2022, 09:56:11 AMLast edit: October 03, 2022, 04:25:58 PM by icopress
content: Quote from:   ➥ A revolutionary new iGaming platform [Starbets Home] & [Discussion Thread]  ➥ List of participants [Spreadsheet]Payment:➥ Posts after 23:59 UTC Sunday will be counted towards the following week.➥ Sr/Hero/Legendary (10x) - 0.0001/post (no minimum/max 25 posts).Rules:➥ Posts in local sections will be taken into account.➥ Post bursting is not allowed, moreover it is easy to check with ninjastic.space.➥ Posts that do not carry a semantic load or posts whose content is less than 160 characters will not be paid.➥ I reserve the right to change the rules and disqualify any post and any participant for any reason.➥ There are a few more obvious things that I haven't mentioned, but which I'll keep a close eye on.➥ Adding additional lines into your signatures is not allowed, (if this is not your personal referral link).➥ Excluded boards, (WO & Serious, Sig, Press, Lending & Ex, Auctions, Politics, G/Rounds & Investor Games, Micro Earnings, Off-topic).➥ The affiliate link in the signatures cannot be changed. This is for stat tracking purposes.Application:Code:Username:Current post count:BTC SegWit Address:➥ Don't apply if you have more neg tags than green tags, or if you have an active flag (c)➥ Do not PM me your application unless you have received a personal invitation.
